definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The fine structure parameters were calculated using a least-squares fitting procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用最小二乘法擬合技術嚴格地計算了精細結構參數。

sentences.english: By comparing the two we finally find a suitable ellipse fitting method for the environment of sea.
sentences.chinese: 通過比較找出一種適用於海洋環境的橢圓擬合方法。

sentences.english: The silicides in the cuticle of wheat straw stem were studied by means of XPS-peak-differenating analysis.
sentences.chinese: 進行麥稈皮層硅化物的XPS測定及分峯擬合分析。

sentences.english: The authors suggest a simplified method of significant test for the compatibility of curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種曲線擬合適度顯著性檢驗的簡化法。

sentences.english: A procedure for properly fitting the diaphragm is described.
sentences.chinese: 阿妥善程序擬合膜片描述。

sentences.english: This paper presents a curve-fitting method to construct Hash functions.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出一種構造哈希函數的曲線擬合法。

sentences.english: This paper proposes the flux mapping method using the higher order harmonics of the neutron equation.
sentences.chinese: 提出用中子方程的高階諧波進行通量擬合的方法。

sentences.english: And related viscous-elastic parameters were gained according to appropriate simulation model.
sentences.chinese: 並選用合適的模型擬合出有關的粘彈性參數。

sentences.english: Curve fitting and auto-regression model are common means in deformation monitoring data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 曲線擬合與自迴歸是變形監測數據分析的常用方法。

sentences.english: Gives a new curve fitting method for non linear sensor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了非線性傳感器的一種曲線擬合方法。

sentences.english: A multi-subarray subspace fitting method, which considers mutual coupling among array elements, to estimate the directions of arrival is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了考慮陣元互耦的子空間擬合波達方向估計方法。

sentences.english: An algorithm for data approximation with global optimal biarc spline is presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用整體最優雙圓弧樣條擬合離散數據點的算法。

sentences.english: The coefficient is fitted from calculating the sediment diffusion coefficient by suspended load model.
sentences.chinese: 通過懸沙模型反求泥沙擴散係數的方法來擬合係數。

sentences.english: S function was the best model in the fitting between stand density and age.
sentences.chinese: 密度與林齡的擬合以S函數爲最優模型。

sentences.english: Determine pitch contours by curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 第二，利用曲線擬合確定調形。

sentences.english: Moreover, model CPDE interpret the long tail of RTD curves perfectly.
sentences.chinese: CPDE模型可以很好地擬合實驗RTD曲線的拖尾。
